name: S-Force Dog Tag
text: Each of your opponent's monsters in the same column as one of your "S-Force" monsters cannot activate its effects during your Main Phase. If your opponent Normal or Special Summons a monster(s) and you control a "S-Force" monster (except during the Damage Step): You can Special Summon this card from your hand. You can only use this effect of "S-Force Dog Tag" once per turn.
